commands.name: HELP
commands.description: Lists all commands and how to use them.

commands.name: TEST
commands.description: Used to check if the Bot is online.

commands.name: Next Customer
commands.description: Displays next customer, Creates Voice Channel

commands.name: Display Admins
commands.description: Display a list of all registered Admins.

commands.name: Display all Onliners
commands.description: Display a list of all Admins set to online.

commands.name: Register Admin
commands.description: Register a new admin (Only for Owners)

commands.name: Deregister Admin
commands.description: Remove a user from the Admin-List

commands.name: Add Note
commands.description: Add a note to the User-File

commands.name: Add Problem
commands.description: Add a Problem to the User-File (Overwrites existing entry)

commands.name: Display Customer
commands.description: Display the Information of a registered customer
